name: Zebra Crossing
description:
Taxi!!

- drive around the city

- give lifts to the local townsfolk

- make a ton of money

- discover secrets

How to Play

- stop by riders to pick them up

- drive as fast as you can to their destination

- drop them off and reap the rewards

Controls

- WASD to drive around

- SPACE is your handbrake

- SHIFT to boost (if you're brave)

Game-A-Month-Athon 

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where we've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! A touch over-time but still in time for Christmas: Novemeber2021.

Support my work!
